import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import React, { Fragment,useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import MetaTags from "react-meta-tags"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { BreadcrumbsItem } from "react-breadcrumbs-dynamic"; import { getDiscountPrice } from "../../helpers/product"; import LayoutOne from "../../layouts/LayoutOne"; import Breadcrumb from "../../wrappers/breadcrumb/Breadcrumb"; const Checkout = ({ location, cartItems, currency }) => { const { pathname } = location; let cartTotalPrice = 0; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", store_id: "", email: "", password: "", user_id: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", city: "", zip: "", address: "", }); return ( Flone | Checkout Home Checkout {/* breadcrumb */}
{cartItems && cartItems.length >= 1 ? (

Billing Details

setFormData({ ...formData, name: event.target.value }) } />
